amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 118-12 to add a sense of Congress that the authority of the Department of Education and the Secretary of Education to operate or administer any office or program related to elementary or secondary education should be terminated on or before December 31, 2023.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a sense of Congress that the authority of the Department of Education and the Secretary of Education to operate or administer any office or program related to elementary or secondary education should be terminated on or before December 31, 2023.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 265 (Roll no. 156).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Massie.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 265 (Roll no. 156).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
